t: What is Brand Strategy? Why is it Important? | Amazon Ads
s: May 30, 2023 - Brand strategy is the plan through which a business is able to define and identify itself favorably with consumers. Incorporating everything from storytelling, values, appearance, and mission, a holistic brand strategy is how a business communicates its promise to consumers.
